LanguageData.setShouldCopyLimitSettingsDesc: When disabled, limit settings will not be copied
LanguageData.mouseInputButtonTooltip: Specify which mouse button to open thing limiter window
LanguageData.shouldShareLimitSettingsWhenLinkedToolti: When disabled, storage buildings will not share limit settings when linked
LanguageData.shouldKeepLimitSettingsWhenUnlinkedToolt: When disabled, unlinked storage buildings all limit settings will be set to unlimited
LanguageData.shouldKeepLimitSettingsWhenUnlinkedFalse: Keep limit settings (Hint : Share limit settings should be allowed)
You should allow share limits settings.
